content: HETLIOZ net product sales were $40.1 million for the fourth quarter of 2022, a 9% decrease compared to $44.1 million in the fourth quarter of 2021. Fanapt net product sales in the fourth quarter of 2022 were $24.4 million, a 2% increase compared to $24 million in the fourth quarter of 2021. For the fourth quarter of 2022, Vanda recorded net income of $6.9 million compared to net income of $7.1 million for the fourth quarter of 2021.
